name: natural gas, high pressure, import from QA | natural gas, high pressure | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/28712/documentation

This dataset represents the import of natural gas [m3] from Qatar to the United Arab Emirates. This import activity is only intended to connect the consumption mix of the supplying country to that of the receiving geography. Any losses, emissions, or energy, infrastructure and transport requirements are not considered in this activity. This import activity is establish as a proxy for the trade situation in 2021 as reported in bp Statistical Review of World Energy June 2022 (bp 2022; http://www.bp.com/statisticalreview)

This activity starts with output of the market for natural gas, high pressure, in the supplying geography.

This activity ends with the supply to the market for natural gas, high pressure, in the receiving geography. Neither losses, emissions, nor energy, infrastructure or transport requirements are considered in this proxy import activity.
category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/352:Manufacture of gas; distribution of gaseous fuels through mains/3520:Manufacture of gas; distribution of gaseous fuels through mains
